item.name: DefinitionsFields
item.query: SELECT NULL AS RegistrationObject, NULL AS ObjectRegistrationType, &ReasonForRegistrationLink AS ReasonForRegistration {WHERE (&ReasonForRegistrationLink) AS ReasonForRegistration}

item.name: DefinitionsFields
item.query: SELECT NULL AS Type, 0 AS CountTotal WHERE FALSE

totalField.expression: CASE WHEN Not ExportObjectCanBe THEN 0 WHEN SUM(RegistrationAutomatically)>0 THEN 1 WHEN SUM(AdvancedRegistration)>0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN Not ExportObjectCanBe THEN NULL WHEN RegistrationAutomatically>0 THEN RegistrationObject WHEN AdvancedRegistration>0 THEN RegistrationObject ELSE NULL END )COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN Not ExportObjectCanBe THEN NULL WHEN RegistrationAutomatically>0 THEN RegistrationObject WHEN AdvancedRegistration>0 THEN RegistrationObject ELSE NULL END )

SUM(CountTotal) - COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN Not ExportObjectCanBe THEN NULL WHEN RegistrationAutomatically>0 THEN RegistrationObject WHEN AdvancedRegistration>0 THEN RegistrationObject ELSE NULL END )SUM(CountTotal) - COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN Not ExportObjectCanBe THEN NULL WHEN RegistrationAutomatically>0 THEN RegistrationObject WHEN AdvancedRegistration>0 THEN RegistrationObject ELSE NULL END )
